text:
Created attachment 29973
Screen Shot of cmd-line to start Apache2 service - does not work

I used httpd-2.0.64-win32.x86-no_ssl (same result for httpd-2.0.64-win32-x86-openssl-0.9.8.o)  Windows Installer on my laptop running Windows 7.

Basically, Apache2 service was not created nor can can be created using a command line (please see attachment).

Hopefully, this can be fixed asap.

Thanks,
FredC

P.S.  the Apache download site does not have an download Windows option for Apache 2.2 version...?
creator: fredc2k9@aol.com

text: 2.0 is end of life, and this problem has not been reported elsewhere as far as I can tell (I create services on Windows 7 without issue with 2.2.x)
creator: covener@gmail.com
